title: Who's responsible?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Individuality
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Behaviorism (Psychology)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Self-actualization (Psychology)
description: Episode of Series "Guidance for the 70's". I am the cause of my own effects. This is a difficult concept for many to accept; most people prefer to "blame" others or environment for what happens to them. Teenagers attending a PACE conference deal with the concept of responsibility. Their discussions highlight how 'what happens to you is under your own control to a very great extent' and that, by exercising your choice, you can 'create the effect your want to have in your life'.
